title: Most popular multi-purpose cleaning products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 8 number of Product Types.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 38.0 is found at Product Type Flash and the minimum is found at Cilit bang where Share of respondents currently purchasing is 20.0.
Product Type Flash has 1.9 times more Share of respondents currently purchasing than Product Type Cilit bang which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Product Type in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
